leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-组学整合与知识图谱生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 对齐→融合→推理→检索→证据链→评测

queries: [WEB] biomedical knowledge graph embedding tools github
[WEB] graph neural networks for drug discovery github
[WEB] link prediction on biomedical networks github
[WEB] multi-omics data integration graph neural network github
[WEB] knowledge graph reasoning frameworks bioinformatics github

tools.name: AmpliGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Library for representation learning on knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for representation learning on knowledge graphs, capable of generating knowledge graph embeddings (KGE) for link prediction, knowledge discovery, and hypothesis generation in scientific datasets.

tools.name: GRAPE
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance graph representation learning library
tools.detailed_description: A Rust/Python library for graph representation learning, focusing on efficient graph processing, embedding generation, and link prediction evaluation, optimized for large-scale biological networks.

tools.name: FIORA
tools.one_line_profile: MS/MS spectrum prediction using graph neural networks
tools.detailed_description: An in silico fragmentation algorithm that uses graph neural networks to predict tandem mass spectra (MS/MS), bond cleavages, and retention times for small molecules, aiding in metabolomics and proteomics identification.

tools.name: flexynesis
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning suite for multi-omics data integration
tools.detailed_description: A deep-learning based multi-modal data integration framework designed to handle bulk and single-cell multi-omics datasets for dimensionality reduction, phenotype prediction, and biomarker discovery.

tools.name: OpenHGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for heterogeneous graph neural networks
tools.detailed_description: An open-source toolkit based on DGL for heterogeneous graph neural networks (HGNNs), providing unified interfaces for running, evaluating, and developing various HGNN models for tasks like node classification and link prediction.

tools.name: ULTRA
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for inductive knowledge graph reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model for knowledge graph reasoning that generalizes to new graphs without retraining, supporting inductive link prediction and reasoning tasks.

tools.name: GraphVite
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance graph embedding system
tools.detailed_description: A general and high-performance graph embedding system designed for high-speed training of node embeddings on large-scale graphs and knowledge graphs, often used in bioinformatics for massive network analysis.

tools.name: BrainGB
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark and library for brain network analysis
tools.detailed_description: A library and benchmark for brain network analysis using graph neural networks, facilitating geometric deep learning on medical imaging data for neuroscience research.

tools.name: KG4SL
tools.one_line_profile: GNN-based model for synthetic lethality prediction in cancer drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: KG4SL is a graph neural network model that leverages knowledge graphs to predict synthetic lethality (SL) interactions, aiding in the discovery of anti-cancer drug targets.

tools.name: SpatialGlue
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning method for spatial multi-omics data integration
tools.detailed_description: SpatialGlue is a graph-based deep learning framework designed to integrate spatial multi-omics data, enabling more accurate interpretation of complex biological tissues.

tools.name: PeSTo
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for protein binding interface prediction
tools.detailed_description: PeSTo (Protein Structure Transformer) is a geometric deep learning method that predicts protein binding interfaces directly from protein structures, useful for structural biology and drug design.

tools.name: DrugLAMP
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal LLM-based system for drug-target interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: DrugLAMP utilizes multi-modal large language models to analyze structural affinities and predict drug-target interactions with high accuracy.

tools.name: DTiGEMSplus
tools.one_line_profile: Network-based tool for computational drug-target interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: DTiGEMSplus is a computational tool that employs graph embedding, graph mining, and similarity-based techniques to predict drug-target interactions.

tools.name: Clinical Knowledge Graph (CKG)
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for integration and analysis of clinical and omics data
tools.detailed_description: The Clinical Knowledge Graph (CKG) is an open-source platform that integrates experimental proteomics data with diverse biomedical databases into a graph database, facilitating automated knowledge discovery and clinical analysis.

tools.name: EEG-DTI
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous graph representation learning framework for DTI prediction
tools.detailed_description: EEG-DTI is an end-to-end heterogeneous graph representation learning-based framework designed for predicting drug-target interactions.

tools.name: LLMReasonCert
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for Chain-of-Thought in multi-hop knowledge graph reasoning
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation for evaluating Chain-of-Thought (CoT) capabilities in multi-hop reasoning tasks over knowledge graphs, providing metrics and certification methods for reasoning paths.

tools.name: BGRL_Pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Bootstrapped Graph Latents (BGRL) for graph representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Large-Scale Representation Learning on Graphs via Bootstrapping, enabling self-supervised learning on graph structures without requiring negative sampling.

tools.name: EvoKG
tools.one_line_profile: Joint modeling of event time and network structure for temporal knowledge graph reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A framework for reasoning over temporal knowledge graphs that jointly models the timing of events and the evolving network structure to predict future interactions.

tools.name: OpenBG-IMG
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline models for multimodal product knowledge graph link prediction
tools.detailed_description: Provides baseline implementations and tools for the CCKS 2022 task on link prediction in multimodal product knowledge graphs, integrating image and text data.

tools.name: OpenBioLink
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework and dataset for biomedical link prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive resource and evaluation framework designed for benchmarking link prediction models on heterogeneous biomedical graph data, ensuring high-quality benchmarks.

tools.name: SAFRAN
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable and fast non-redundant rule application for link prediction
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for efficient application of logical rules in large knowledge graphs to perform link prediction, focusing on scalability and speed.

tools.name: GAT
tools.one_line_profile: Reference implementation of Graph Attention Networks
tools.detailed_description: The original implementation of Graph Attention Networks (GATs), a novel neural network architecture that operates on graph-structured data, leveraging masked self-attentional layers.

tools.name: Edgeformers
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-empowered transformers for representation learning on textual-edge networks
tools.detailed_description: A framework that integrates graph structural information with transformer architectures to enhance representation learning on networks where edges contain rich textual information.

tools.name: GEANet-BioMed-Event-Extraction
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical event extraction using hierarchical knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting biomedical events from text by leveraging hierarchical knowledge graphs to capture complex relationships and dependencies.

tools.name: ChromeGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Networks for DNA sequence classification
tools.detailed_description: Implements a graph neural network approach for classifying DNA sequences, modeling the sequences as graph structures to capture spatial and structural dependencies.

tools.name: CP-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Context path-based GNN for community detection in heterogeneous graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network model designed to detect communities in heterogeneous graphs by utilizing context paths to capture semantic relationships.

tools.name: ChatRule
tools.one_line_profile: Mining logical rules with LLMs for knowledge graph reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A framework that leverages Large Language Models to mine logical rules from knowledge graphs, enhancing reasoning capabilities in a cost-effective manner.

tools.name: graph-constrained-reasoning
tools.one_line_profile: Faithful reasoning on knowledge graphs with Large Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A method for constraining LLM reasoning processes using knowledge graph structures to ensure faithfulness and reduce hallucinations in multi-hop reasoning tasks.

tools.name: Reasoning on Graphs (RoG)
tools.one_line_profile: Faithful and interpretable LLM reasoning on graphs
tools.detailed_description: A framework that synergizes Large Language Models with Knowledge Graphs to perform faithful and interpretable reasoning, enabling the model to generate reasoning paths grounded in the graph.

tools.name: RTX-KG2
tools.one_line_profile: Build system for the RTX-KG2pre biomedical knowledge graph
tools.detailed_description: The build system and workflow for constructing the RTX-KG2pre biomedical knowledge graph, which integrates data from multiple sources for the ARAX reasoning system.

tools.name: DKGR
tools.one_line_profile: Dual agent reinforcement learning for knowledge graph reasoning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Learning to Walk with Dual Agents for Knowledge Graph Reasoning', using reinforcement learning to navigate knowledge graphs for reasoning tasks.

tools.name: BioBridge
tools.one_line_profile: Bridging biomedical foundation models via knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A method to align and bridge biomedical foundation models using knowledge graphs, enhancing their capability to understand and reason about biomedical concepts.

tools.name: TransENet
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based multi-stage enhancement for remote sensing image super-resolution
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for super-resolution of remote sensing images, utilizing a Transformer-based architecture to enhance image quality for earth observation tasks.

tools.name: pytorch_geometric_signed_directed
tools.one_line_profile: GNN extension library for signed and directed graphs
tools.detailed_description: An extension library for PyTorch Geometric specifically designed to handle signed and directed graphs, providing specialized layers and utilities for these graph types.

tools.name: BioKEEN
tools.one_line_profile: Library for learning and evaluating biological knowledge graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A computational library tailored for training and evaluating knowledge graph embedding models specifically on biological data, facilitating bioinformatics research.

tools.name: pykg2vec
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for knowledge graph embedding and representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for knowledge graph embedding, providing implementations of state-of-the-art algorithms for representation learning on graphs.

tools.name: DacKGR
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic anticipation and completion for multi-hop reasoning over sparse KGs
tools.detailed_description: A reasoning framework designed for sparse knowledge graphs, using dynamic anticipation to complete missing information during multi-hop reasoning processes.

tools.name: MetaKGR
tools.one_line_profile: Meta-learning framework for multi-hop reasoning over few-shot relations
tools.detailed_description: A meta-learning approach for knowledge graph reasoning, specifically targeting few-shot relations where data is scarce, by adapting meta-knowledge.

tools.name: CogKR
tools.one_line_profile: Cognitive knowledge graph reasoning for one-shot relational learning
tools.detailed_description: A cognitive reasoning framework for knowledge graphs that addresses one-shot relational learning, mimicking cognitive processes to infer new relations from minimal examples.

tools.name: HGB
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Heterogeneous Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite for evaluating and refining Heterogeneous Graph Neural Networks (HGNNs), providing standard datasets and evaluation protocols.

tools.name: ConvE
tools.one_line_profile: Convolutional 2D Knowledge Graph Embeddings implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of ConvE, a convolutional neural network model for knowledge graph link prediction. It serves as a standard baseline and tool for generating embeddings in knowledge graph reasoning tasks.

tools.name: MedReason
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset and framework for medical reasoning with LLMs and Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A resource and framework designed to elicit factual medical reasoning steps in Large Language Models (LLMs) by leveraging Knowledge Graphs. It aids in analyzing and improving the reasoning capabilities of AI in the biomedical domain.

tools.name: NeuroGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic GNN framework for EEG seizure detection
tools.detailed_description: A framework for precise seizure detection and classification from EEG data using dynamic Graph Neural Networks. It captures spatial, temporal, and semantic correlations between EEG electrodes and brain regions.

tools.name: SGGRL
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal representation learning for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a multi-modal representation learning framework for molecular property prediction, integrating sequence, graph, and geometry information of molecules.

tools.name: RulE
tools.one_line_profile: Neural-Symbolic Knowledge Graph Reasoning framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for neural-symbolic knowledge graph reasoning that incorporates rule embedding. It combines the interpretability of logical rules with the scalability of embedding-based methods for link prediction and reasoning.

tools.name: TAPE
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-to-LM Interpreter for Text-Attributed Graph Learning
tools.detailed_description: A framework that harnesses explanations from Large Language Models (LLMs) to enhance representation learning on text-attributed graphs. It is applicable to scientific graphs where nodes have textual descriptions (e.g., biomedical entities).

tools.name: GraphEmbedding-TransX
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of TransE/TransD/TransH/TransR
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing multiple translation-based knowledge graph embedding models (TransE, TransD, TransH, TransR) using TensorFlow. It is used for learning vector representations of entities and relations in knowledge graphs.

tools.name: FusionDTI
tools.one_line_profile: Token-level fusion module for Drug-Target Interaction Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting drug-target interactions (DTI) using a token-level fusion module to capture fine-grained information between drug molecules and protein targets.

tools.name: HM-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Motif Graph Neural Networks for Molecular Representation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Heterogeneous Motif Graph Neural Networks (HM-GNN) for molecular representation learning. It leverages motif-level information to improve property prediction tasks in chemistry.

tools.name: TransE-TF
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of TransE model
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight TensorFlow implementation of the TransE model for knowledge graph embedding. It provides basic functionality for training and evaluating TransE on standard datasets.

tools.name: SpectralEmbeddings
tools.one_line_profile: Library for generating node embeddings from Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for generating node embeddings from Knowledge Graphs using Graph Convolutional Network (GCN) kernels and Graph Autoencoders. It supports variations like VanillaGCN, ChebyshevGCN, and Spline GCN.

tools.name: pyHGT
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Heterogeneous Graph Transformer (HGT) for modeling heterogeneous graphs
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch Geometric based implementation of the Heterogeneous Graph Transformer (HGT) model, designed to handle heterogeneous information networks (HINs) often found in academic graphs and knowledge graphs.

tools.name: MINN-DTI
tools.one_line_profile: Drug-target interaction prediction using mutual interaction neural network
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model implementation for predicting drug-target interactions (DTI) by utilizing a mutual interaction neural network architecture to capture the interplay between drug and target features.

tools.name: molgraph
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks for molecular machine learning in TensorFlow/Keras
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing various Graph Neural Network (GNN) architectures specifically tailored for molecular machine learning, fully compatible with TensorFlow and Keras APIs.

tools.name: Rce-KGQA
tools.one_line_profile: Relational Chain Reasoning framework for multi-hop Knowledge Graph Question Answering
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline framework designed to improve multi-hop embedded Knowledge Graph Question Answering (KGQA) by introducing relational chain reasoning to handle complex queries.

tools.name: Euler
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale distributed graph deep learning framework
tools.detailed_description: A distributed graph deep learning framework developed by Alibaba, designed to support training on very large-scale graphs with billions of nodes and edges.

tools.name: Chemogenomic-DTI-Prediction-Methods
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of algorithms for chemogenomic drug-target interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based collection of computational methods and algorithms for predicting drug-target interactions using chemogenomic approaches.

tools.name: RECON
tools.one_line_profile: Relation Extraction using Knowledge Graph Context in a GNN
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the RECON model for relation extraction, which leverages knowledge graph context within a Graph Neural Network framework to improve extraction accuracy.

tools.name: DySAT
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Graph Representation Learning using Self-Attention Networks
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of DySAT, a model for learning node representations on dynamic graphs using self-attention mechanisms to capture structural and temporal evolution.

tools.name: DGL-KE
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance library for learning large-scale knowledge graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance, scalable package built on Deep Graph Library (DGL) for training knowledge graph embedding models on large-scale datasets.

tools.name: DGL-LifeSci
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks package for chemistry and biology
tools.detailed_description: A python package based on DGL that provides GNN models, datasets, and tools specifically optimized for tasks in life sciences, including molecular property prediction and reaction prediction.

tools.name: SimplE
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of SimplE Embedding for Link Prediction in Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the SimplE knowledge graph embedding model, used for link prediction tasks and reasoning over knowledge graphs.

tools.name: Context_Aware_SSL
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based Self-supervised Representation Learning for Medical Images
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a context-aware self-supervised learning method that utilizes graph structures to improve representation learning for medical imaging analysis.

tools.name: InGram
tools.one_line_profile: Inductive Knowledge Graph Embedding via Relation Graphs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of InGram, a method for inductive knowledge graph embedding that can handle unseen entities by leveraging relation graphs.

tools.name: TransE_type
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Graph Embedding with Entity Type Constraints
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the TransE model that incorporates entity type constraints to improve the quality of knowledge graph embeddings.

tools.name: ClusterGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient Algorithm for Training Deep and Large Graph Convolutional Networks
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of ClusterGCN, an efficient algorithm designed to train deep and large-scale Graph Convolutional Networks by clustering the graph.

tools.name: GAM
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Classification Using Structural Attention
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the Graph Attention Model (GAM) for graph classification tasks, utilizing structural attention mechanisms.

tools.name: GraphWaveletNeuralNetwork
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Wavelet Neural Network implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Graph Wavelet Neural Networks (GWNN), which uses graph wavelets instead of the Fourier transform for graph convolution.

tools.name: SGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Signed Graph Convolutional Network implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Signed Graph Convolutional Networks (SGCN), designed to learn representations for signed graphs containing both positive and negative links.

tools.name: PyTorch Geometric Temporal
tools.one_line_profile: Spatiotemporal Signal Processing with Neural Machine Learning Models
tools.detailed_description: A temporal extension library for PyTorch Geometric, providing methods for spatiotemporal signal processing and dynamic graph learning.

tools.name: Bigraph
tools.one_line_profile: Bipartite-network link prediction library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library specifically designed for link prediction in bipartite networks, offering various algorithms and utilities for this graph structure.

tools.name: BioCypher
tools.one_line_profile: A unifying framework for biomedical research knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to democratize the creation and use of biomedical knowledge graphs by providing a modular and user-friendly interface for mapping and integrating diverse biomedical data.

tools.name: pytorch-graphsage
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of GraphSAGE
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the GraphSAGE algorithm for inductive representation learning on large graphs.

tools.name: GATK
tools.one_line_profile: Genome Analysis Toolkit for variant discovery in high-throughput sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: The industry-standard toolkit for variant discovery in high-throughput sequencing data, offering a wide range of tools for data processing and variant calling.

tools.name: TA_TransE
tools.one_line_profile: Temporal Knowledge Graph Completion model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a temporal knowledge graph completion method based on TransE and sequence encoders, designed to predict missing links in evolving knowledge graphs.

tools.name: ProjE
tools.one_line_profile: Embedding projection model for Knowledge Graph Completion
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the ProjE model for knowledge graph completion, which uses a shared variable neural network model to fill in missing information in knowledge graphs by learning low-dimensional embeddings.

tools.name: KBGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Adversarial learning framework for Knowledge Graph Embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A framework implementing adversarial learning for knowledge graph embeddings, designed to improve the performance of existing embedding models by using a generator-discriminator architecture.

tools.name: PheKnowLator
tools.one_line_profile: Ecosystem for constructing heterogeneous biomedical knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Python ecosystem for constructing heterogeneous biomedical knowledge graphs and benchmarks using alternative semantic models, facilitating the integration of complex biomedical data.

tools.name: Mixture-of-Partitions (MoP)
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for infusing large biomedical knowledge graphs into BERT
tools.detailed_description: A model designed to infuse large-scale biomedical knowledge graphs into BERT-based language models to enhance their performance on biomedical NLP tasks.

tools.name: CROssBAR
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive resource and tools for biomedical relations and KG representation
tools.detailed_description: A system providing comprehensive resources of biomedical relations with deep learning applications and knowledge graph representations, aiding in drug discovery and systems biology.

tools.name: MultiTensor
tools.one_line_profile: Multilayer network tensor factorization tool
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for multilayer network tensor factorization, supporting community detection, link prediction, and measurement of layer interdependence in complex networks.

tools.name: Geometric GNN Dojo
tools.one_line_profile: Unified framework for exploring Geometric Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A library providing unified implementations and experiments to explore the design space of Geometric Graph Neural Networks, useful for modeling 3D molecular structures and physical systems.

tools.name: gRNAde
tools.one_line_profile: Generative AI framework for inverse design of 3D RNA structures
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning framework for the inverse design of 3D RNA structures and functions, enabling the generation of RNA sequences that fold into desired backbone structures.

tools.name: LLM3-DTI
tools.one_line_profile: LLM and multi-modal framework for Drug-Target Interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework leveraging Large Language Models and multi-modal data for predicting Drug-Target Interactions (DTI), integrating textual and structural information.

tools.name: TransEPI
tools.one_line_profile: Enhancer-promoter interaction prediction model
tools.detailed_description: A computational model for predicting enhancer-promoter interactions (EPI) using translation-based embedding methods.

tools.name: QuatE
tools.one_line_profile: Quaternion Knowledge Graph Embeddings implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Quaternion Knowledge Graph Embeddings (QuatE), which uses hypercomplex valued embeddings to capture rich interaction patterns in knowledge graphs.

tools.name: gnn-eeg
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Convolutional Networks for EEG signal classification
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of graph convolutional networks (GCNs) based on PyTorch Geometric to classify EEG signals, modeling the brain connectivity as a graph.

tools.name: FCGF
tools.one_line_profile: Fully Convolutional Geometric Features for 3D registration
tools.detailed_description: A method for computing fast and accurate 3D geometric features using fully convolutional networks, applicable to 3D registration tasks in various scientific domains including structural biology.

tools.name: CLDR_CLNER_models
tools.one_line_profile: Relation-aware sentence embeddings for relation extraction
tools.detailed_description: A contrastive learning framework that trains sentence embeddings to encode relations in a graph structure, improving relation extraction and named entity recognition tasks, particularly useful for constructing scientific knowledge graphs.

tools.name: pytorch-rgn
tools.one_line_profile: Recurrent Geometric Network for protein structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Recurrent Geometric Networks (RGN), a model designed for predicting protein structures from amino acid sequences.

tools.name: FedHGN
tools.one_line_profile: Federated Framework for Heterogeneous Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A federated learning framework specifically designed for Heterogeneous Graph Neural Networks (HGNNs), enabling privacy-preserving training on distributed graph data.

tools.name: MAGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Metapath Aggregated Graph Neural Network for Heterogeneous Graph Embedding
tools.detailed_description: A model for heterogeneous graph embedding that aggregates information from metapath instances, capturing both semantic and structural information in heterogeneous information networks.

tools.name: MECCH
tools.one_line_profile: Metapath Context Convolution-based Heterogeneous Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A heterogeneous graph neural network model utilizing metapath context convolution to learn node embeddings in heterogeneous graphs.

tools.name: GPTrans
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Propagation Transformer for Graph Representation Learning
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based model for graph representation learning that incorporates graph propagation mechanisms to capture long-range dependencies.

tools.name: CapsE
tools.one_line_profile: Capsule Network-based Embedding Model for Knowledge Graph Completion
tools.detailed_description: An embedding model for knowledge graph completion and search personalization that utilizes capsule networks to model relationship triples.

tools.name: GNN-NoGE
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Networks for Knowledge Graph Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network based approach for link prediction in knowledge graphs, focusing on node-to-graph embedding.

tools.name: R-MeN
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based Memory Networks for Knowledge Graph Embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A model leveraging Transformer-based memory networks to learn knowledge graph embeddings, capturing long-term dependencies in relational data.

tools.name: STransE
tools.one_line_profile: Embedding model of entities and relationships in knowledge bases
tools.detailed_description: A novel embedding model for entities and relationships in knowledge bases, combining the strengths of structured embedding and translation-based models.

tools.name: HAG-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Aggregations for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network model designed to enhance information propagation through heterogeneous aggregations, improving performance on graph tasks.

tools.name: Multi-Fidelity GNNs
tools.one_line_profile: Transfer learning with GNNs for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework for molecular property prediction in a multi-fidelity setting using transfer learning with Graph Neural Networks, applicable to drug discovery and quantum mechanics.

tools.name: AutoRDF2GML
tools.one_line_profile: Framework to transform RDF data into GNN-ready datasets
tools.detailed_description: A framework that semi-automatically transforms RDF data into heterogeneous graph datasets suitable for graph-based machine learning, specifically Graph Neural Networks.

tools.name: TransC
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Graph Embedding differentiating Concepts and Instances
tools.detailed_description: A knowledge graph embedding model that differentiates between concepts and instances, handling the transitivity of 'isA' relations effectively.

tools.name: gnnforhin
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Graph Neural Networks on Heterogeneous Information Networks
tools.detailed_description: A library for applying Graph Neural Networks to Heterogeneous Information Networks (HIN), covering data storage, network embedding, and explanation tasks.

tools.name: dialog-HGAT
tools.one_line_profile: Dialogue Relation Extraction with Heterogeneous Graph Attention Networks
tools.detailed_description: A model for dialogue relation extraction using document-level Heterogeneous Graph Attention Networks, useful for extracting structured information from conversational text.

tools.name: Attention-based Relation Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Attention-based embeddings for relation prediction in Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of attention-based embeddings for predicting relations in knowledge graphs, as presented at ACL 2019.

tools.name: Gravity-GAE
tools.one_line_profile: Gravity-Inspired Graph Autoencoders for Directed Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Source code for Gravity-Inspired Graph Autoencoders, a method for directed link prediction in graphs, leveraging physics-inspired gravity models.

tools.name: TransERR
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Graph Embedding via Efficient Relation Rotation
tools.detailed_description: A translation-based knowledge graph embedding model that utilizes efficient relation rotation to model complex relations.

tools.name: ckblib
tools.one_line_profile: Tools to create clinical knowledge graphs from literature
tools.detailed_description: A library of tools to create clinical knowledge graphs from biomedical literature, including wrappers for NCBI Eutils, cTakes annotator, and Neo4J integration.

tools.name: BLP
tools.one_line_profile: Inductive Entity Representations from Text via Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A model for generating inductive entity representations from text using link prediction objectives, bridging textual data and knowledge graphs.

tools.name: INDRA
tools.one_line_profile: Automated model assembly system for generating causal graphs and dynamical models from literature and databases
tools.detailed_description: INDRA (Integrated Network and Dynamical Reasoning Assembler) allows users to collect knowledge from natural language and databases, and assemble it into executable models (e.g., PySB, BNGL) or causal networks. It is widely used in systems biology to automate the construction of mechanistic models.

tools.name: OntologyRAG
tools.one_line_profile: RAG-based tool for biomedical code mapping and ontology alignment
tools.detailed_description: OntologyRAG leverages Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and Large Language Models (LLMs) to perform accurate mapping of biomedical terms to standard ontology codes. It utilizes ontology knowledge graphs to enhance the context for LLMs, improving the precision of medical coding and data normalization tasks.

tools.name: MolTrans
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Interaction Transformer for drug-target interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: MolTrans is a deep learning framework based on Transformer architecture designed to predict drug-target interactions (DTI). It models the interaction between drug molecules and protein targets by capturing substructure interactions, facilitating virtual screening and drug repurposing tasks.

tools.name: Graphormer-PyG
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch Geometric implementation of Graphormer for graph representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch Geometric implementation of the Graphormer model, a graph transformer architecture that effectively encodes structural information for graph-level prediction tasks, widely used in molecular property prediction.

tools.name: Geometric Vector Perceptron
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant neural network primitives for 3D biomolecular structure learning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Geometric Vector Perceptron (GVP), a graph neural network architecture designed to learn rotation-equivariant representations of 3D biomolecular structures, essential for protein design and structure analysis.

tools.name: PNA (Principal Neighbourhood Aggregation)
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of PNA layer for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Provides implementations of Principal Neighbourhood Aggregation (PNA) for GNNs in PyTorch, DGL, and PyTorch Geometric. PNA is particularly effective for molecular graphs with varying degree distributions.

tools.name: DTINet
tools.one_line_profile: Network integration approach for drug-target interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A computational pipeline that integrates heterogeneous network information (drugs, proteins, diseases, side-effects) to predict novel drug-target interactions using low-dimensional feature learning.

tools.name: Hyper-SAGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Self-attention based graph neural network for hypergraphs
tools.detailed_description: A hypergraph representation learning framework using self-attention, designed to handle high-order correlations in data, with applications in biomedical networks (e.g., gene-disease associations).

tools.name: knowledge-graph-embeddings
tools.one_line_profile: Library of embedding-based methods for Knowledge Base Completion
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive collection of implementations for various Knowledge Graph Embedding (KGE) models (TransE, RotatE, ConvE, etc.), facilitating the application of KGE methods to scientific knowledge graphs.

tools.name: DRAGON
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Bidirectional Language-Knowledge Graph Pretraining model
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained foundation model that fuses text and knowledge graphs to support complex reasoning tasks, widely applicable to biomedical question answering and reasoning over scientific literature.

tools.name: Decagon
tools.one_line_profile: Graph convolutional neural network for polypharmacy side effect prediction
tools.detailed_description: A graph convolutional neural network model for multirelational link prediction, specifically designed to model polypharmacy side effects by reasoning over multimodal graphs of drugs and proteins.

tools.name: OhmNet
tools.one_line_profile: Representation learning in multi-layer tissue-specific networks
tools.detailed_description: A hierarchy-aware unsupervised feature learning approach for multi-layer networks, enabling the generation of tissue-specific protein embeddings for functional prediction.

tools.name: scikit-kge
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for computing knowledge graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing a unified interface for training and evaluating various knowledge graph embedding models (Rescal, TransE, HolE, etc.), facilitating their use in scientific knowledge discovery.

tools.name: LinkPrediction
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Weisfeiler-Lehman Neural Machine for graph link prediction
tools.detailed_description: A C-based implementation of the Weisfeiler-Lehman Neural Machine (WLNM) algorithm for link prediction in graphs, as presented in KDD 2017.

tools.name: SEAL
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for link prediction using Subgraphs, Embeddings, and Attributes
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the SEAL framework (NeurIPS 2018) which learns from subgraphs, embeddings, and attributes to perform link prediction in graphs using Graph Neural Networks.

tools.name: MTransE
tools.one_line_profile: Multilingual Knowledge Graph Embeddings for Cross-lingual Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A tool for cross-lingual knowledge alignment using Multilingual Knowledge Graph Embeddings (MTransE), enabling entity alignment across different language knowledge graphs.

tools.name: gnn-powerflow
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network solver for AC Power Flow calculation
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network application developed with PyTorch Geometric to predict AC Power Flow calculations, modeling power grid topology and physics.

tools.name: gnn_hierarchical_pooling
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Pooling mechanism for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of hierarchical graph representation learning with differentiable pooling, enabling multi-scale graph analysis.

tools.name: KGPool
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Knowledge Graph Context Selection for Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for relation extraction that dynamically selects relevant context from knowledge graphs (KGPool), enhancing NLP tasks with structured knowledge.

tools.name: ncats-adme
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction models for ADME properties hosted by NCATS
tools.detailed_description: The source code for the ADME@NCATS application, providing prediction models for Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, and Excretion properties of chemical compounds.

tools.name: BootEA
tools.one_line_profile: Bootstrapping Entity Alignment with Knowledge Graph Embedding
tools.detailed_description: A bootstrapping approach for entity alignment in knowledge graphs, utilizing knowledge graph embeddings to iteratively label likely alignment pairs.

tools.name: KG-ICL
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Graph Foundation Model for Universal In-Context Reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model framework for performing universal in-context reasoning on knowledge graphs, enabling few-shot inference tasks.

tools.name: MultiKE
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view Knowledge Graph Embedding for Entity Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A multi-view embedding framework for entity alignment that combines multiple views of knowledge graphs (names, relations, attributes) to improve alignment accuracy.

tools.name: OpenEA
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking Library for Embedding-based Entity Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking library for embedding-based entity alignment techniques, providing standard datasets and implementations of various algorithms.

tools.name: TransEdge
tools.one_line_profile: Translating Relation-contextualized Embeddings for Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A knowledge graph embedding model that contextualizes relation embeddings based on edge interactions, improving link prediction and reasoning performance.

tools.name: muKG
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Multi-source Knowledge Graph Embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for handling multi-source knowledge graph embeddings and their applications, facilitating integration of diverse KG sources.

tools.name: proteinsolver
tools.one_line_profile: GNN for protein sequence generation and folding
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network based tool for generating novel amino acid sequences that fold into proteins with predetermined topologies, aiding in protein design.

tools.name: Attention-Gated-Networks
tools.one_line_profile: Attention Gates for Medical Image Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Convolutional Neural Network architecture incorporating Attention Gates for improved medical image classification and segmentation tasks.

tools.name: KARE
tools.one_line_profile: Reasoning-Enhanced Healthcare Predictions with Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for healthcare predictions that enhances reasoning by retrieving and utilizing community structures within knowledge graphs.

tools.name: EPInformer
tools.one_line_profile: Gene expression and gene-enhancer link prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting gene expression levels and identifying gene-enhancer links, utilizing genomic data and machine learning models.

tools.name: PyTorch Geometric
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network Library for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning extension library for PyTorch, providing primitives and methods for deep learning on graphs and other irregular structures, widely used in scientific graph modeling.

tools.name: PyKEEN
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for learning and evaluating knowledge graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for training and evaluating knowledge graph embedding models, offering a unified pipeline for dataset loading, training, and evaluation.

tools.name: gcn-over-pruned-trees
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Convolution over Pruned Dependency Trees for Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for relation extraction that applies Graph Convolutional Networks over pruned dependency trees, improving the capture of long-distance dependencies in text for KG construction.

tools.name: linkpred
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for link prediction in graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to simplify the process of link prediction in graphs, providing implementations of various topological and probabilistic predictors.

tools.name: lm-bio-kgc
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical Knowledge Graph Completion using Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging pretrained language models to perform knowledge graph completion specifically for biomedical knowledge graphs.

tools.name: mkb
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Base Embedding By Cooperative Knowledge Distillation
tools.detailed_description: A library for knowledge base embedding that utilizes cooperative knowledge distillation to improve the quality and efficiency of embeddings.

tools.name: grafog
tools.one_line_profile: Graph data augmentation library for PyTorch Geometric
tools.detailed_description: A library dedicated to graph data augmentation, providing various transformation techniques to enhance the robustness and performance of Graph Neural Networks (GNNs).

tools.name: Know-Evolve
tools.one_line_profile: Deep temporal reasoning model for dynamic knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a deep evolutionary knowledge network that models the temporal evolution of entities and relations in dynamic knowledge graphs for reasoning and prediction.

tools.name: DeltaConv
tools.one_line_profile: Anisotropic operators for geometric deep learning on point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning method introducing anisotropic convolution operators for point clouds, applicable to structural data analysis.

tools.name: MultiHopKG
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-hop knowledge graph reasoning via policy gradient
tools.detailed_description: A reinforcement learning-based framework for multi-hop reasoning in knowledge graphs, utilizing policy gradients with reward shaping to infer missing links.

tools.name: ConPLex
tools.one_line_profile: Drug-target interaction prediction using protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A method for highly accurate drug-target interaction prediction that adapts protein language models and utilizes contrastive learning.

tools.name: EMOGI
tools.one_line_profile: Explainable multi-omics graph integration for cancer gene prediction
tools.detailed_description: A graph convolutional network-based method for integrating multi-omics data to predict cancer genes with interpretability.

tools.name: unKR
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Uncertain Knowledge Graph Reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for handling reasoning tasks on uncertain knowledge graphs, supporting various embedding models and uncertainty representations.

tools.name: KGReasoning
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Hop Logical Reasoning in Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for multi-hop logical reasoning over knowledge graphs, supporting complex query answering tasks.

tools.name: NOUS
tools.one_line_profile: System for construction, querying, and reasoning with knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A streaming system for building, querying, and performing reasoning on knowledge graphs, designed for scalability and real-time processing.

tools.name: InfoGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised and semi-supervised graph-level representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A method for learning graph-level representations via mutual information maximization, applicable to molecular graphs and other scientific graph data.

tools.name: MedType
tools.one_line_profile: Medical entity linking with semantic type prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for improving medical entity linking by incorporating semantic type prediction, facilitating better extraction of information from biomedical text.

tools.name: LinChemIn
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for processing and analyzing chemical reaction data
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit that leverages the connectivity of chemical reaction data to provide actionable insights and metrics for synthetic routes.

tools.name: Kingdon
tools.one_line_profile: Symbolically optimized Geometric Algebra library
tools.detailed_description: A library for Geometric Algebra (Clifford Algebra) that supports symbolic optimization and compatibility with PyTorch/NumPy, useful for physics and geometric modeling.

tools.name: Fast-TransX
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient C++ implementation of TransE and extended Knowledge Graph Embedding models
tools.detailed_description: An efficient, high-performance implementation of TransE and its extensions (TransH, TransR, etc.) for knowledge representation learning, designed for speed and scalability.

tools.name: KB2E
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive toolkit for Knowledge Graph Embeddings (TransE, TransH, TransR, PTransE)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of knowledge graph embedding implementations including TransE, TransH, TransR, and PTransE, serving as a foundational toolkit for knowledge representation learning.

tools.name: OpenKE
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source package for Knowledge Graph Embedding with PyTorch and C++ interfaces
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive and efficient framework for knowledge graph embedding (KGE) that supports various models (TransE, TransH, TransR, ComplEx, etc.) and provides unified interfaces for training and evaluation.

tools.name: TensorFlow-TransX
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of TransE and extended Knowledge Graph Embedding models
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow-based implementation of TransE and its variants for knowledge representation learning, enabling integration with TensorFlow ecosystems.

tools.name: DeepPBS
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning model for predicting protein–DNA binding specificity
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning framework that predicts protein-DNA binding specificity by modeling the geometry and physicochemical properties of the molecular interface.

tools.name: TorchKGE
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch-based library for Knowledge Graph Embedding
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for knowledge graph embedding (KGE) built on PyTorch, providing efficient implementations of various KGE models and utilities for training and evaluation.

tools.name: MOGONET
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Omics Graph Convolutional Networks for biomedical classification
tools.detailed_description: A framework for integrative analysis of multi-omics data using graph convolutional networks (GCN) to perform classification tasks in biomedical applications such as cancer subtype identification.

tools.name: TypeDB Bio
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical Knowledge Graph schema and data loader for TypeDB
tools.detailed_description: A specialized schema and data integration tool for creating a biomedical knowledge graph within TypeDB, facilitating the querying and reasoning over complex biological data.

tools.name: BioGrakn
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical Knowledge Graph template for Grakn (TypeDB)
tools.detailed_description: A template and set of tools for building a biomedical knowledge graph using Grakn (now TypeDB), enabling the integration of various biomedical datasets.

tools.name: LibKGE
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducible Knowledge Graph Embedding library
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library for knowledge graph embedding (KGE) focused on reproducibility, hyperparameter optimization, and providing a standardized environment for KGE research.

tools.name: torchlensmaker
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable geometric optics and optical system design in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A tool for differentiable geometric optics simulation and optimization, allowing the design of optical systems using PyTorch's automatic differentiation capabilities.

tools.name: BioKGBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for AI Agents in Biomedical Science Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking framework designed to evaluate the performance of AI agents on biomedical knowledge graph tasks, providing datasets and evaluation metrics.

tools.name: GraphSAGE
tools.one_line_profile: Reference implementation of GraphSAGE for inductive representation learning on large graphs
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive reference implementation of the GraphSAGE algorithm, widely used for generating node embeddings in large-scale biological and chemical networks. It supports inductive learning, allowing for the generation of embeddings for unseen nodes, which is critical for dynamic scientific data.

tools.name: GraphSAGE-Simple
tools.one_line_profile: Simplified reference implementation of GraphSAGE
tools.detailed_description: A simplified and easy-to-understand implementation of GraphSAGE. While less feature-rich than the main repository, it serves as a lightweight tool for quick experimentation and understanding of inductive graph representation learning in scientific contexts.

tools.name: RE-Net (dynamic-KG)
tools.one_line_profile: Recurrent Event Network for reasoning over temporal knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A solver for temporal knowledge graph completion using Recurrent Event Networks (RE-Net). It is designed to model the temporal evolution of facts in knowledge graphs, which is essential for analyzing dynamic biological events and interactions.

tools.name: BioGrakn
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Graph-based Semantic Database for Biomedical Sciences
tools.detailed_description: A semantic database solution built on Grakn (TypeDB) specifically for biomedical sciences. It provides a schema and framework for integrating and querying complex biomedical data as a knowledge graph, facilitating semantic analysis.

tools.name: BioNEV
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical Network Embedding Evaluation Framework
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for evaluating graph embedding methods on biomedical networks. It provides a collection of datasets and standard implementations of various graph embedding algorithms to benchmark performance in biomedical tasks like link prediction and node classification.

tools.name: DKRL
tools.one_line_profile: Representation Learning of Knowledge Graphs with Entity Descriptions
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Description-Embodied Knowledge Representation Learning (DKRL). This tool learns knowledge graph embeddings by incorporating entity descriptions, which is particularly useful for scientific KGs where textual definitions of entities (e.g., proteins, diseases) are rich.

tools.name: DeepPath
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement Learning Method for Knowledge Graph Reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A reinforcement learning-based framework for multi-hop reasoning over knowledge graphs. It is widely used to find interpretable paths between entities in large-scale KGs, supporting tasks like drug repurposing and biological pathway discovery.

tools.name: CENET
tools.one_line_profile: Temporal Knowledge Graph Reasoning with Historical Contrastive Learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for reasoning over temporal knowledge graphs using historical contrastive learning. It captures the evolutionary dynamics of graph structures, applicable to analyzing time-series biological data and event sequences.

tools.name: DeepDrugDomain
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for drug-target interaction prediction and binding affinity
tools.detailed_description: A versatile Python toolkit designed for the preprocessing and prediction of drug-target interactions (DTI) and binding affinities. It leverages deep learning models to streamline computational drug discovery workflows.

tools.name: PLNLP
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise Learning Neural Link Prediction for OGB
tools.detailed_description: A solver specifically designed for link prediction tasks on the Open Graph Benchmark (OGB), which includes large-scale biomedical networks. It utilizes pairwise learning strategies to improve prediction accuracy on scientific graph datasets.

tools.name: NeuralKG
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source Python toolkit for Knowledge Graph Representation Learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for knowledge graph representation learning, supporting various KGE models (TransE, RotatE, etc.) and GNN-based models. It is designed to facilitate the development and evaluation of KG embeddings for scientific and general domains.
